divs: Sighting Detailsit looks like a bright bright star, and moves and pulsates..i have seen this for many years about this time of year, but not every year..there are no other stars out tonight..it appears close so i opened the door to make sure it wasn't a plane..no sound...my mother saw it first, but she also keeps an eye out for lights...i would say we have seen these off and on for almost 13 years now..i am just wondering if anyone else has seen anything in new hampshire tonight..it doesn't upset us or anything..like i said we have seen these off and on for a while..after seeing it the first time we started looking for it..it's now 620est and it's still there, but not as bright, it appears to have moved off...
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Wolfeboro
There were no other sightings in Wolfeboro on or around January 9th 2009
